resources.string: Welcome to BudgetBuddy! The goal of this app is to help you become more concious of the day to day spending choices you make.
This tutorial will show you the basics of the app, and get some basic information to work with.
We want out users to be budget conscious, and to develop proper spending habits!

The first thing you will see when you log in is a graph that plots the total amount you\'ve spent so far in a month. Whenever you spend money, you can use the (+) button in the lower right to enter details about your purchase. All of the information gathered in this app is stored locally, and is used to generate statistics about your spending habits.
Be sure to check out the other pages accessible through the menu!
Now we just need some basic information to help chart your spending.
First, how much income do you have each month?
And how much would you like to save each month? (Use the dropdown menu to switch between a flat amount and a percentage)
